name: Chapel Of The World Wide Web
name_original: Chapel Of The World Wide Web
description:
Take a Walk in the chapel of the World Wide Web. 
How to play:
Mouse to move. You'll get it after wiggling the mouse a bit:D
Alt+F4 to quit like a proper jam project



Upcoming things for you to love this project:
Internet Trolls, Nonsense Posters, Lurkers, Grammar Correcters :D
Keyboard Heroes, Speedrunners
Mini BossFight
Big Bad Boss fight
A Dynamic Map (which means a couple of locks on doors and keys that you get for completing stupid online objectives)




here's a bit about the development:
Three Game Enthusiasts took some time out of a very busy life's to participate in the MinijJam:Internet. Made some thingies. Put the thingies into Unity.
